title: Signs of 1906 earthquake revealed in mapping of offshore northern San Andreas Fault

title_detail.value: Signs of 1906 earthquake revealed in mapping of offshore northern San Andreas Fault

summary: A new high-resolution map of a poorly known section of the northern San Andreas Fault reveals signs of the 1906 San Francisco earthquake, and may hold some clues as to how the fault could rupture in the future, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: A new high-resolution map of a poorly known section of the northern San Andreas Fault reveals signs of the 1906 San Francisco earthquake, and may hold some clues as to how the fault could rupture in the future, according to a new study.
